description:
On orders from the Five Elders, the CP-0 agent Guernica tries to get to Luffy, but Drake stands in his way. Meanwhile, Luffy who only has very little energy left uses his last Gear Four to emancipate the people of the Land of Wano from Kaido.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Es kann nur einen Sieger geben – Ruffy vs. Kaido
Shousha wa Hitori: Luffy vs Kaidou
There Is Only One Winner - Luffy vs. Kaido
Un seul vainqueur. Luffy contre Kaido !
هناك منتصر واحد - لوفي ضدّ كايدو!
勝者はひとり ルフィVSカイドウ
